description: [Restricted to Final Year BE students] Thesis on subject selected or approved by Head of School. Detailed statements on requirements supplied. Students commencing thesis in Semester 1 enrol in ENGG4801 for Sem 1 (Part A) and Sem 2 (Part B); students commencing in Semester 2 enrol in ENGG4802 for Sem 2 (Part A) and the following Sem 1 (Part B).
incompatible: COMP4801 or COMP4802 or COMP4807 or COMP4808 or ELEC4801 or ELEC4802 or 3E400 or 3E401 or 3E491 or 3E492
restricted: Restricted to Final Year BE Students.
